<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82305</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82305</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4623</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">People in Business</string>
            <string language="es">La gente en los negocios</string>
            <string language="ga">Daoine i nGnó</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leute im Geschäft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les gens dans les affaires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Povos no negócio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La gente nel commercio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωποι στην επιχείρηση</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Factsheet discussing the importance of managing relationships in a business, with each of the key groupings then being analysed individually.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja informativa que expone la importancia de gestionar relaciones en un negocio, analizando después  cada uno de los grupos clave, de forma individual.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog fírice a phléann tábhacht bainistiu a dhéanamh ar chaidrimh i ngnó agus déantar anailís ansin ar na príomhghrúpaí ina n-aonair.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
            <string language="es">Empresariales. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Gnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Checkliste, die den Wert des Handhabens von von 
Verhältnissen in einem Geschäft, mit jeder der 
Schlüsselgruppierungen dann einzeln analysiert werden behandelt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fiche de données discutant l'importance de 
contrôler des rapports dans des affaires, avec chacun des groupements
principaux alors étant analysés individuellement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Factsheet que discute a importância de controlar 
relacionamentos em um negócio, com o cada um dos agrupamentos chaves 
então que estão sendo analisados individualmente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scheda che discute importanza di gestione dei 
rapporti in un commercio, con ciascuno dei raggruppamenti chiave 
allora che sono analizzati individualmente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενημερωτικό δελτίο που συζητά τη σημασία τις σχέσεις 
σε μια επιχείρηση, με κάθε έναν από τους βασικούς σχηματισμούς 
ομάδας που αναλύονται έπειτα χωριστά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
